Steve you must of lost your mind. Why would you sell out the millions that liked you well brother you mite not be able to come back from this, I know for me and my family we will no longer support anything you do now Steve your done black people don't think you were right, although you have a right o meet with who ever you want, you just forgot what this man said and feels about black people and people of color. So I'm throwing out everything Steve Harvey from my house, such items like your book, your films, when I watch the Kings I will fast forward pass your ass Steve, why do some people get a little and decide to bow down to hate, you can't help your people by bowing down, that's what he wants fool, and you took the bate, Bow down to me DT, your done Steve.

Ya if you knew anything about religion or God you'd know that's not how it works. So how nice of you to grace us with your uneducated answer. God is light and is only good the devil is darkness and causes disasters and bad things to happen. If God fixed everything all the time how would there ever be a good and an evil? How when miracles happen could we say it was God. I'm a grateful believer in Jesus Christ but I am also not stupid. This had nothing to do with God or the devil it had everything to do with three lunatics who used arson to burn down a wooded area that is surrounded by homes and businesses. God didn't make that choice for them. He can only send the angels to protect and watch over with his love and grace.....I know this was a horrible disaster but it could have been much much worse more people could have died the state could be covered in fire no just two little towns. These criminals set this spot on fire bc they knew it would get the attention of others it's a heavy populated area and they were obviously mad at someone or something to want to cause so much distraction. In fact they might even have been mad at God and the only reason someone would be mad at God is bc they don't know him and don't care to. I feel bad for them.

Throw Hillary in jail! As an American hispanic, I'm tired of how all of these coward racist liberals that hate America like Obama, Clinton, and their supporters are trying to turn this great country into a 3rd world one. Unfortunately, one of the biggest problems we have right now is the media and entertainment that are always trying to tell us how to think. They have created enough imbeciles that would re-elect a failure like Obama. Even more, I'm supposed to bow down to anti-American Obama, love liberal policies no matter how destructive they are, love bigger enslaving government, and be in favor of illegal immigration because of the color of my skin... disgusting. That's why I and others created """"Chepo Team"""", the first true pro-America, comic strip. Please support our cause by liking our facebook page at: . Thank you

Who would be more friendly to the corporations Hillary or Bernie? It is quite obvious as to the agenda of these corporations that pander to those who will maintain their wealth and power in the halls of our government.
